{"id":1051884742,"question_id":12,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"9 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1694965100,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1051884742/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Integer to Roman","memory":"6.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\nstd::string repeatString(const char& s, size_t count) {\n    return std::string(count,s);\n}\n\n    string intToRoman(int num) {\n        string res = \"\";\n        size_t temp = 0 ;\n        temp = num / 1000;\n        num =num % 1000;\n        if ( temp != 0) {\n            res += repeatString('M' , temp);\n        }\n        temp = num / 100;\n        num =num % 100;\n        if (temp != 0) {\n            if(temp < 4)\n                res += repeatString('C' , temp);\n            else if (temp == 4)\n                res +=  \"CD\";\n            else if (temp < 9)\n                res += 'D' + repeatString('C' , temp-5);\n            else if (temp == 9)\n                res += \"CM\";\n        }\n        temp = num / 10;\n        num =num % 10;\n        if (temp != 0) {\n            if(temp < 4)\n                res += repeatString('X' , temp);\n            else if (temp == 4)\n                res +=  \"XL\";\n            else if (temp < 9)\n                res += 'L' + repeatString('X' , temp-5);\n            else if (temp == 9)\n                res += \"XC\";\n        }\n        temp = num ;\n        if (temp != 0) {\n            if(temp < 4)\n                res += repeatString('I' , temp);\n            else if (temp == 4)\n                res += \"IV\";\n            else if (temp < 9)\n                res += 'V' + repeatString('I' , temp-5);\n            else if (temp == 9)\n                res += \"IX\";\n        }\n        return res ;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"integer-to-roman","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
